abstract: American nuclear expert Jeffrey Lewis reports that satellite imagery shows North Korea has begun to refurbish key uranium mill in Pyongsan, indication government is planning to expand country's uranium production capacity.
lead_paragraph: Recent satellite imagery showed that in the last year, North Korea had begun to refurbish a major uranium mill in Pyongsan.

headline.main: North Korea: U.S. Expert Says Uranium Capacity Seems to Be Increasing, Possibly for Nuclear Weapons
headline.print_headline: Asia; North Korea: U.S. Expert Says Uranium Capacity Seems to Be Increasing, Possibly for Nuclear Weapons

snippet: Recent satellite imagery showed that in the last year, North Korea had begun to refurbish a major uranium mill in Pyongsan.
